ygData.subject: Building new weapon skills
ygData.msgSnippet: I am a 12th level Bard on The Rathe. I now have roughly 65 skill in 1H slashing and find myself wanting to explore other weapon types. I am planning on
ygData.messageBody:
I am a 12th level Bard on The Rathe. I now have roughly 65 skill in 1H
slashing and find myself wanting to explore other weapon types. I am
planning on building my 1H blunt and piercing after reviewing the array of
"special" weapons available in these areas at later levels. I equipped a
dagger and began my task. Then I wondered about what to fight. If I fight
blue mobs, I can't kill them fast enough without running and sometimes
zoning if I can't get my Mino axe out in time to save my worthless hide.

I assume if I begin with green con mobs, my skill won't go up... Or will it?

Anyone have any suggestions for a strategy here?

Twen - Bard - The Rathe
Doug Donaldson (250)549-2911
